","workspace_file_chunks":[]},{"status":"success","request_id":"e16eaba7-cf29-46a0-a319-d861a96748aa","request_message":"","structured_output_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":5,"content":"","tool_use":{"tool_use_id":"toolu_01BoHFwuxxfGtWi8ZAUM8Gyx","tool_name":"view","input_json":"{"type": "file", "path": "app/globals.css"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":0,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":2,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"Here's the result of running `cat -n` on app/page.tsx:
 1	'use client';
 2	
 3	import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
 4	import { motion, AnimatePresence } from 'framer-motion';
 5	import { Parallax } from 'react-parallax';
 6	import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button';
 7	import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card';
 8	import { Input } from '@/components/ui/input';
 9	import { Label } from '@/components/ui/label';
 10	import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge';
 11	import { Separator } from '@/components/ui/separator';
 12	import { 
 13	 Shield, 
 14	 Eye, 
 15	 Mic, 
 16	 Building2, 
 17	 UserPlus, 
 18	 Zap, 
 19	 Lock, 
 20	 Scan,
 21	 LogIn,
 22	 UserCheck,
 23	 ArrowRight,
 24	 Code,
 25	 Crown,
 26	 Users
 27	} from 'lucide-react';
 28	import { useRouter } from 'next/navigation';
 29	import { toast } from 'sonner';
 30	
 31	interface Workspace {
 32	 id: string;
 33	 name: string;
 34	 code: string;
 35	 role: 'admin' | 'user';
 36	 createdDate: string;
 37	}
 38	
 39	interface UserAccount {
 40	 email: string;
 41	 password: string;
 42	 workspaces: Workspace[];
 43	}
 44	
 45	export default function LandingPage() {
 46	 const [authMode, setAuthMode] = useState<'login' | 'signup' | null>(null);
 47	 const [signupMode, setSignupMode] = useState<'workspace' | 'admin' | null>(null);
 48	 const [email, setEmail] = useState('');
 49	 const [password, setPassword] = useState('');
 50	 const [workspaceCode, setWorkspaceCode] = useState('');
 51	 const [workspaceName, setWorkspaceName] = useState('');
 52	 const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false);
 53	 const [userWorkspaces, setUserWorkspaces] = useState<Workspace[]>([]);
 54	 const [showWorkspaces, setShowWorkspaces] = useState(false);
 55	 const [manualWorkspaceCode, setManualWorkspaceCode] = useState('');
 56	 const router = useRouter();
 57	
 58	 // Generate random workspace code
 59	 const generateWorkspaceCode = () => {
 60	 const chars = 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789';
 61	 let result = '';
 62	 for (let i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
 63	 result += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * chars.length));
 64	 }
 65	 return result;
 66	 };
 67	
 68	 // Load existing accounts from localStorage
 69	 const loadAccounts = (): UserAccount[] => {
 70	 const accounts = localStorage.getItem('userAccounts');
 71	 return accounts ? JSON.parse(accounts) : [];
 72	 };
 73	
 74	 // Save accounts to localStorage
 75	 const saveAccounts = (accounts: UserAccount[]) => {
 76	 localStorage.setItem('userAccounts', JSON.stringify(accounts));
 77	 };
 78	
 79	 const handleLogin = async () => {
 80	 if (!email.trim() || !password.trim()) {
 81	 toast.error('Please enter email and password');
 82	 return;
 83	 }
 84	
 85	 setIsLoading(true);
 86	 
 87	 // Check if user exists
 88	 const accounts = loadAccounts();
 89	 const userAccount = accounts.find(acc => acc.email === email && acc.password === password);
 90	 
 91	 setTimeout(() => {
 92	 if (userAccount) {
 93	 setUserWorkspaces(userAccount.workspaces);
 94	 setShowWorkspaces(true);
 95	 toast.success('Login successful');
 96	 } else {
 97	 toast.error('Invalid email or password');
 98	 }
 99	 setIsLoading(false);
 100	 }, 1500);
 101	 };
 102	
 103	 const handleSignup = async () => {
 104	 if (!email.trim() || !password.trim()) {
 105	 toast.error('Please enter email and password');
 106	 return;
 107	 }
 108	
 109	 if (signupMode === 'workspace' && !workspaceCode.trim()) {
 110	 toast.error('Please enter workspace code');
 111	 return;
 112	 }
 113	
 114	 if (signupMode === 'admin' && !workspaceName.trim()) {
 115	 toast.error('Please enter workspace name');
 116	 return;
 117	 }
 118	
 119	 setIsLoading(true);
 120	
 121	 setTimeout(() => {
 122	 const accounts = loadAccounts();
 123	 let userAccount = accounts.find(acc => acc.email === email);
 124	
 125	 if (!userAccount) {
 126	 userAccount = {
 127	 email,
 128	 password,
 129	 workspaces: []
 130	 };
 131	 accounts.push(userAccount);
 132	 }
 133	
 134	 if (signupMode === 'admin') {
 135	 const newWorkspace: Workspace = {
 136	 id: Date.now().toString(),
 137	 name: workspaceName,
 138	 code: generateWorkspaceCode(),
 139	 role: 'admin',
 140	 createdDate: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]
 141	 };
 142	 userAccount.workspaces.push(newWorkspace);
 143	 toast.success(`Admin workspace created! Code: ${newWorkspace.code}`);
 144	 } else if (signupMode === 'workspace') {
 145	 // Simulate workspace code validation
 146	 const isValidCode = workspaceCode.length === 8;
 147	 if (isValidCode) {
 148	 const newWorkspace: Workspace = {
 149	 id: Date.now().toString(),
 150	 name: `Workspace ${workspaceCode}`,
 151	 code: workspaceCode,
 152	 role: 'user',
 153	 createdDate: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]
 154	 };
 155	 userAccount.workspaces.push(newWorkspace);
 156	 toast.success('Successfully joined workspace');
 157	 } else {
 158	 toast.error('Invalid workspace code');
 159	 setIsLoading(false);
 160	 return;
 161	 }
 162	 }
 163	
 164	 saveAccounts(accounts);
 165	 setUserWorkspaces(userAccount.workspaces);
 166	 setShowWorkspaces(true);
 167	 setIsLoading(false);
 168	 }, 2000);
 169	 };
 170	
 171	 const handleWorkspaceEntry = (workspace: Workspace) => {
 172	 const userData = {
 173	 email,
 174	 password,
 175	 workspaceId: workspace.id,
 176	 workspaceName: workspace.name,
 177	 workspaceCode: workspace.code,
 178	 userType: workspace.role
 179	 };
 180	 localStorage.setItem('userData', JSON.stringify(userData));
 181	 router.push('/workspace');
 182	 };
 183	
 184	 const handleManualWorkspaceEntry = () => {
 185	 if (!manualWorkspaceCode.trim()) {
 186	 toast.error('Please enter workspace code');
 187	 return;
 188	 }
 189	
 190	 const userData = {
 191	 email,
 192	 password,
 193	 workspaceCode: manualWorkspaceCode,
 194	 workspaceName: `Workspace ${manualWorkspaceCode}`,
 195	 userType: 'user'
 196	 };
 197	 localStorage.setItem('userData', JSON.stringify(userData));
 198	 toast.success('Entering workspace...');
 199	 router.push('/workspace');
 200	 };
 201	
 202	 const resetForm = () => {
 203	 setAuthMode(null);
 204	 setSignupMode(null);
 205	 setShowWorkspaces(false);
 206	 setEmail('');
 207	 setPassword('');
 208	 setWorkspaceCode('');
 209	 setWorkspaceName('');

 2	
 3	import { useState } from 'react';
 4	import { motion, AnimatePresence } from 'framer-motion';
 5	import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button';
 6	import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card';
 7	import { Progress } from '@/components/ui/progress';
 8	import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge';
 9	import {
 10	 Eye, Mic, Camera, CheckCircle, Loader2, Terminal, Play
 11	} from 'lucide-react';
 12	import { toast } from 'sonner';
 13	
 14	interface BiometricAuthProps {
 15	 onAuthComplete: (result: {
 16	 success: boolean;
 17	 username?: string;
 18	 step?: 'face' | 'voice' | 'complete';
 19	 message?: string;
 20	 }) => void;
 21	}
 22	
 23	type AuthStep = 'idle' | 'python' | 'processing' | 'complete';
 24	
 25	export default function BiometricAuth({ onAuthComplete }: BiometricAuthProps) {
 26	 const [currentStep, setCurrentStep] = useState<AuthStep>('idle');
 27	 const [progress, setProgress] = useState(0);
 28	 const [isRunning, setIsRunning] = useState(false);
 29	
 30	 const runPythonAuthentication = async () => {
 31	 setCurrentStep('python');
 32	 setIsRunning(true);
 33	 setProgress(25);
 34	
 35	 try {
 36	 const response = await fetch('http://localhost:8000/api/python/authenticate', {
 37	 method: 'POST',
 38	 headers: {
 39	 'Content-Type': 'application/json',
 40	 },
 41	 body: JSON.stringify({ action: 'authenticate' }),
 42	 });
 43	
 44	 if (!response.ok) {
 45	 throw new Error(`Server returned ${response.status}`);
 46	 }
 47	
 48	 const result = await response.json();
 49	 setProgress(75);
 50	 setCurrentStep('processing');
 51	
 52	 setTimeout(() => {
 53	 setProgress(100);
 54	 setCurrentStep('complete');
 55	
 56	 if (result.success) {
 57	 onAuthComplete({
 58	 success: true,
 59	 username: result.username,
 60	 step: 'complete',
 61	 message: 'Python biometric authentication successful'
 62	 });
 63	 toast.success(`Welcome back, ${result.username}!`);
 64	 } else {
 65	 onAuthComplete({
 66	 success: false,
 67	 message: result.message || 'Authentication failed'
 68	 });
 69	 toast.error(result.message || 'Authentication failed');
 70	 }
 71	
 72	 setIsRunning(false);
 73	 }, 2000);
 74	 } catch (error: any) {
 75	 console.error('Auth error:', error);
 76	 setIsRunning(false);
 77	 setCurrentStep('idle');
 78	 toast.error('Failed to connect to authentication system');
 79	 onAuthComplete({
 80	 success: false,
 81	 message: 'Connection to Python backend failed'
 82	 });
 83	 }
 84	 };

Let me create a detailed plan to convert it to a "popince" theme with light colors, proper card alignments, and remove unnecessary elements.

## Detailed Plan for "Popince" Theme Conversion

Based on my analysis, here's my comprehensive plan:

### 1. **Application Naming & Branding**
- Change application name from "SecureAuth" to "**Popince Auth**" 
- Update package.json name to "popince-auth-system"

### 2. **Color Scheme Transformation (Light Theme)**
- Replace dark cyberpunk theme with light, soft colors
- Primary colors: Soft pastels (lavender, mint green, peach, sky blue)
- Background: Light cream/off-white gradients
- Cards: Light backgrounds with subtle shadows
- Text: Dark colors for readability on light backgrounds

### 3. **CSS & Styling Overhaul**
- Update globals.css with new light color palette
- Remove cyber/dark theme elements (cyber-grid, dark gradients)
- Implement soft, rounded card designs
- Add gentle animations and transitions

### 4. **Card Layout Optimization**
- Reorganize dashboard cards in better grid layouts
- Remove unnecessary/redundant cards
- Improve responsive design for mobile/tablet
- Better spacing and alignment

### 5. **Content Enhancement**
- Add more relevant content sections
- Improve user experience with cleaner interfaces
- Better navigation and user flows

### 6. **Component Updates**
- Update all React components to use new theme
- Modify button styles, form elements
- Update icons and visual elements

Let me start implementing this plan:

## Detailed Plan for "Popince" Theme Conversion

- Replace dark cyberpunk theme with light, soft colors

- Cards: Light backgrounds with subtle shadows
- Text: Dark colors for readability on light backgrounds

### 3. **CSS & Styling Overhaul**

### 4. **Card Layout Optimization**
- Reorganize dashboard cards in better grid layouts

### 5. **Content Enhancement**
- Add more relevant content sections

### 6. **Component Updates**
- Update all React components to use new theme
- Modify button styles, form elements

 39	interface UserAccount {

 43	}
 44	
 45	export default function LandingPage() {
 46	 const [authMode, setAuthMode] = useState<'login' | 'signup' | null>(null);
 47	 const [signupMode, setSignupMode] = useState<'workspace' | 'admin' | null>(null);
 48	 const [email, setEmail] = useState('');
 49	 const [password, setPassword] = useState('');
 50	 const [workspaceCode, setWorkspaceCode] = useState('');
 51	 const [workspaceName, setWorkspaceName] = useState('');
 52	 const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false);
 53	 const [userWorkspaces, setUserWorkspaces] = useState<Workspace[]>([]);
 54	 const [showWorkspaces, setShowWorkspaces] = useState(false);
 55	 const [manualWorkspaceCode, setManualWorkspaceCode] = useState('');
 56	 const router = useRouter();
 57	
 58	 // Generate random workspace code
 59	 const generateWorkspaceCode = () => {
 60	 const chars = 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789';
 61	 let result = '';
 62	 for (let i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
 63	 result += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * chars.length));
 64	 }
 65	 return result;
 66	 };
 67	
 68	 // Load existing accounts from localStorage
 69	 const loadAccounts = (): UserAccount[] => {
 70	 const accounts = localStorage.getItem('userAccounts');
 71	 return accounts ? JSON.parse(accounts) : [];
 72	 };
 73	
 74	 // Save accounts to localStorage
 75	 const saveAccounts = (accounts: UserAccount[]) => {
 76	 localStorage.setItem('userAccounts', JSON.stringify(accounts));
 77	 };
 78	
 79	 const handleLogin = async () => {
 80	 if (!email.trim() || !password.trim()) {
 81	 toast.error('Please enter email and password');
 82	 return;
 83	 }
 84	
 85	 setIsLoading(true);
 86	 
 87	 // Check if user exists
 88	 const accounts = loadAccounts();
 89	 const userAccount = accounts.find(acc => acc.email === email && acc.password === password);
 90	 
 91	 setTimeout(() => {
 92	 if (userAccount) {
 93	 setUserWorkspaces(userAccount.workspaces);
 94	 setShowWorkspaces(true);
 95	 toast.success('Login successful');
 96	 } else {
 97	 toast.error('Invalid email or password');
 98	 }
 99	 setIsLoading(false);
 100	 }, 1500);
 101	 };
 102	
 103	 const handleSignup = async () => {
 104	 if (!email.trim() || !password.trim()) {
 105	 toast.error('Please enter email and password');
 106	 return;
 107	 }
 108	
 109	 if (signupMode === 'workspace' && !workspaceCode.trim()) {
 110	 toast.error('Please enter workspace code');
 111	 return;
 112	 }
 113	
 114	 if (signupMode === 'admin' && !workspaceName.trim()) {
 115	 toast.error('Please enter workspace name');
 116	 return;
 117	 }
 118	
 119	 setIsLoading(true);
 120	
 121	 setTimeout(() => {
 122	 const accounts = loadAccounts();
 123	 let userAccount = accounts.find(acc => acc.email === email);
 124	
 125	 if (!userAccount) {
 126	 userAccount = {
 127	 email,
 128	 password,
 129	 workspaces: []
 130	 };
 131	 accounts.push(userAccount);
 132	 }
 133	
 134	 if (signupMode === 'admin') {
 135	 const newWorkspace: Workspace = {
 136	 id: Date.now().toString(),
 137	 name: workspaceName,
 138	 code: generateWorkspaceCode(),
 139	 role: 'admin',
 140	 createdDate: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]
 141	 };
 142	 userAccount.workspaces.push(newWorkspace);
 143	 toast.success(`Admin workspace created! Code: ${newWorkspace.code}`);
 144	 } else if (signupMode === 'workspace') {
 145	 // Simulate workspace code validation
 146	 const isValidCode = workspaceCode.length === 8;
 147	 if (isValidCode) {
 148	 const newWorkspace: Workspace = {
 149	 id: Date.now().toString(),
 150	 name: `Workspace ${workspaceCode}`,
 151	 code: workspaceCode,
 152	 role: 'user',
 153	 createdDate: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]
 154	 };
 155	 userAccount.workspaces.push(newWorkspace);
 156	 toast.success('Successfully joined workspace');
 157	 } else {
 158	 toast.error('Invalid workspace code');
 159	 setIsLoading(false);
 160	 return;
 161	 }
 162	 }
 163	
 164	 saveAccounts(accounts);
 165	 setUserWorkspaces(userAccount.workspaces);
 166	 setShowWorkspaces(true);
 167	 setIsLoading(false);
 168	 }, 2000);
 169	 };
 170	
 171	 const handleWorkspaceEntry = (workspace: Workspace) => {
 172	 const userData = {
 173	 email,
 174	 password,
 175	 workspaceId: workspace.id,
 176	 workspaceName: workspace.name,
 177	 workspaceCode: workspace.code,
 178	 userType: workspace.role
 179	 };
 180	 localStorage.setItem('userData', JSON.stringify(userData));
 181	 router.push('/workspace');
 182	 };
 183	
 184	 const handleManualWorkspaceEntry = () => {
 185	 if (!manualWorkspaceCode.trim()) {
 186	 toast.error('Please enter workspace code');
 187	 return;
 188	 }
 189	
 190	 const userData = {
 191	 email,
 192	 password,
 193	 workspaceCode: manualWorkspaceCode,
 194	 workspaceName: `Workspace ${manualWorkspaceCode}`,
 195	 userType: 'user'
 196	 };
 197	 localStorage.setItem('userData', JSON.stringify(userData));
 198	 toast.success('Entering workspace...');
 199	 router.push('/workspace');
 200	 };
 201	
 202	 const resetForm = () => {
 203	 setAuthMode(null);
 204	 setSignupMode(null);
 205	 setShowWorkspaces(false);
 206	 setEmail('');
 207	 setPassword('');
 208	 setWorkspaceCode('');
 209	 setWorkspaceName('');
 210	 setManualWorkspaceCode('');
 211	 setUserWorkspaces([]);
 212	 };
 213	
 214	 return (

 217	 <div className="absolute inset-0 cyber-grid opacity-15"></div>

 6	import { Card, CardContent, CardDescription, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '@/components/ui/card';
 7	import { Progress } from '@/components/ui/progress';
 8	import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge';
 9	import {
 10	 Eye, Mic, Camera, CheckCircle, Loader2, Terminal, Play
 11	} from 'lucide-react';
 12	import { toast } from 'sonner';
 13	
 14	interface BiometricAuthProps {
 15	 onAuthComplete: (result: {
 16	 success: boolean;
 17	 username?: string;
 18	 step?: 'face' | 'voice' | 'complete';
 19	 message?: string;
 20	 }) => void;
 21	}
 22	
 23	type AuthStep = 'idle' | 'python' | 'processing' | 'complete';
 24	
 25	export default function BiometricAuth({ onAuthComplete }: BiometricAuthProps) {
 26	 const [currentStep, setCurrentStep] = useState<AuthStep>('idle');
 27	 const [progress, setProgress] = useState(0);
 28	 const [isRunning, setIsRunning] = useState(false);
 29	
 30	 const runPythonAuthentication = async () => {
 31	 setCurrentStep('python');
 32	 setIsRunning(true);
 33	 setProgress(25);
 34	
 35	 try {
 36	 const response = await fetch('http://localhost:8000/api/python/authenticate', {
 37	 method: 'POST',
 38	 headers: {
 39	 'Content-Type': 'application/json',
 40	 },
 41	 body: JSON.stringify({ action: 'authenticate' }),
 42	 });
 43	
 44	 if (!response.ok) {
 45	 throw new Error(`Server returned ${response.status}`);
 46	 }
 47	
 48	 const result = await response.json();
 49	 setProgress(75);
 50	 setCurrentStep('processing');
 51	
 52	 setTimeout(() => {
 53	 setProgress(100);
 54	 setCurrentStep('complete');
 55	
 56	 if (result.success) {
 57	 onAuthComplete({
 58	 success: true,
 59	 username: result.username,
 60	 step: 'complete',
 61	 message: 'Python biometric authentication successful'
 62	 });
 63	 toast.success(`Welcome back, ${result.username}!`);
 64	 } else {
 65	 onAuthComplete({
 66	 success: false,
 67	 message: result.message || 'Authentication failed'
 68	 });
 69	 toast.error(result.message || 'Authentication failed');
 70	 }
 71	
 72	 setIsRunning(false);
 73	 }, 2000);
 74	 } catch (error: any) {
 75	 console.error('Auth error:', error);
 76	 setIsRunning(false);
 77	 setCurrentStep('idle');
 78	 toast.error('Failed to connect to authentication system');
 79	 onAuthComplete({
 80	 success: false,
 81	 message: 'Connection to Python backend failed'
 82	 });
 83	 }
 84	 };
